DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the administration of a standard anesthetic drug (propofol) using an automatic, expert-based system versus a manually controlled system by the anesthesiologist. In addition, the performance of the decision support system will be evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Closed-loop Sedation of Propofol for Patients Undergoing Spinal Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing hip or knee replacement under spinal anesthesia contraindication to spinal anesthesia allergies to any study drug
